name: textView
description: Displays a value with a simple text field.

name: numberSlider
description: Displays a number with a controllable slider.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum value of the slider

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the slider

properties.name: increment
properties.description: How much to move the slider by with the arrow keys

name: numberBar
description: Displays a number with a view-only bar.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum value of the slider

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the slider

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center ("zero") value of the bar

name: dial
description: Displays a number with a view-only dial. Displayed values are rounded to the nearest integer.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum value of the slider

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the slider

properties.name: showValue
properties.description: Whether or not to show the value as text

name: graph
description: Displays a number with a graph. NOTE: graphs can be taxing on the computer running the dashboard. Keep the number of visible data points to a minimum. Making the widget smaller also helps with performance, but may cause the graph to become difficult to read.

properties.name: visibleTime
properties.description: How long, in seconds, should past data be visible for

name: booleanBox
description: Displays a boolean value as a large colored box.

properties.name: colorWhenTrue
properties.description: Can be specified as a string ({@code "#00FF00"}) or a rgba integer ({@code 0x00FF0000})

name: toggleButton
description: Displays a boolean with a fixed-size toggle button.

name: toggleSwitch
description: Displays a boolean with a fixed-size toggle switch.

name: voltageView
description: Displays an analog input or a raw number with a number bar.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum value of the slider

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum value of the slider

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center ("zero") value of the bar

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The orientation of the bar. One of {@code ["HORIZONTAL", "VERTICAL"]}

properties.name: numOfTickMarks
properties.description: The number of discrete ticks on the bar

properties.name: increment
properties.description: How much to move the slider by with the arrow keys

name: powerDistribution
description: Displays a number with a graph. NOTE: graphs can be taxing on the computer running the dashboard. Keep the number of visible data points to a minimum. Making the widget smaller also helps with performance, but may cause the graph to become difficult to read.

properties.name: visibleTime
properties.description: Whether or not to display the voltage and current draw

name: comboBoxChooser
description: Displays a {@link edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard.SendableChooser SendableChooser} with a toggle button for each available option.

name: encoder
description: Displays an {@link edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Encoder} displaying its speed, total traveled distance, and its distance per tick.

name: motorController
description: Displays a {@link edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.motorcontrol.MotorController MotorController}. The motor controller will be controllable from the dashboard when test mode is enabled, but will otherwise be view-only.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: The orientation of the bar. One of {@code ["HORIZONTAL", "VERTICAL"]}

name: command
description: Displays a command with a toggle button. Pressing the button will start the command, and the button will automatically release when the command completes.

name: pidCommand
description: Displays a PID command with a checkbox and an editor for the PIDF constants. Selecting the checkbox will start the command, and the checkbox will automatically deselect when the command completes.

name: pidController
description: Displays a PID controller with an editor for the PIDF constants and a toggle switch for enabling and disabling the controller.

name: accelerometer
description: Displays an accelerometer with a number bar displaying the magnitude of the acceleration and text displaying the exact value.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimum acceleration value to display

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum acceleration value to display

properties.name: showText
properties.description: Show or hide the acceleration values

properties.name: precision
properties.description: How many numbers to display after the decimal point

properties.name: showTickMarks
properties.description: Show or hide the tick marks on the number bars

name: accelerometer3Axis
description: Displays a 3-axis accelerometer with a number bar for each axis' acceleration.

properties.name: range
properties.description: The minimum acceleration value to display

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximum acceleration value to display

properties.name: showValue
properties.description: Show or hide the acceleration values

properties.name: precision
properties.description: How many numbers to display after the decimal point

properties.name: showTickMarks
properties.description: Show or hide the tick marks on the number bars

name: gyro
description: Displays a gyro with a dial from 0 to 360 degrees.

properties.name: startingAngle
properties.description: How far to rotate the entire dial

name: relay
description: Displays a relay with toggle buttons for each supported mode (off, on, forward, reverse).

name: differentialDrive
description: Displays a differential drive with a widget that displays the speed of each side of the drivebase and a vector for the direction and rotation of the drivebase. The widget will be controllable if the robot is in test mode.

properties.name: wheelDiameter
properties.description: How far to rotate the entire dial

name: mecanumDrive
description: Displays a mecanum drive with a widget that displays the speed of each wheel, and vectors for the direction and rotation of the drivebase. The widget will be controllable if the robot is in test mode.

name: cameraStream
description: Displays a camera stream.

properties.name: showCrosshair
properties.description: Show or hide a crosshair on the image

properties.name: crosshairColor
properties.description: Can be specified as a string ({@code "#00FF00"}) or a rgba integer ({@code 0x00FF0000})

properties.name: showControls
properties.description: Show or hide the stream controls

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: Rotates the displayed image. One of {@code ["NONE", "QUARTER_CW", "QUARTER_CCW", "HALF"]}

name: field2d
description: Displays a Field2d object.
